title: Two column table with two sets of scores

content.question: The table depicts scores on a personality assessment measuring the trait of extraversion. Higher scores mean higher levels of extraversion. Which of the following is true of the two sets of scores above?

choices.label: Set A has a larger standard deviation.
Set B has a larger standard deviation.
Set A has a lower median score than set B.
The mean score is the same for both distributions.

content.answer: Set B has a larger standard deviation.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
